attributes.action: Ignore the petition for a second EU referendum. It's unfair and unjust.
attributes.additional_details: In no other election has there ever been any reconsideration of the vote results, once the votes have been cast and counted that's it! Brexit have had more votes and there should be no consideration of having another vote just because some people aren't happy with the result!
attributes.background: Petition to ignore the stupid petition that has been started by the people that voted 'remain' in the EU referendum, brexit won the right to leave the EU and regardless of what some people may be led to believe, leaving the EU is the best thing for Britain!
